thread.title: STEM Spotlight: Aero Day encourages next generation to pursue aerospace, aviation careers
thread.title_full: STEM Spotlight: Aero Day encourages next generation to pursue aerospace, aviation careers

author: Addison Kliewer
title: STEM Spotlight: Aero Day encourages next generation to pursue aerospace, aviation careers
text:
STEM Spotlight: Aero Day encourages next generation to pursue aerospace, aviation careers
Each week, KOCO 5 will be shining a light on STEM-focused programs, educators and students around the state.
Each week, KOCO 5 will be shining a light on STEM-focused programs, educators and students around the state.
Each week, KOCO 5 will be shining a light on STEM-focused programs, educators and students around the state.
Each week, KOCO 5 will be shining a light on STEM-focused programs, educators and students around the state.
STEM stands for science, technology, engineering and math. This week, KOCO 5 was at 2025 Aero Oklahoma Day at the state Capitol.
Students from all over the state came to the event to learn about the careers and opportunities available in aerospace, aviation and defense.
Open the video player above for the full story.
